cu.explanation_en: Setting mnc_length to an out-of-range value (10) will cause invalid PLMN configuration and network registration failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofUplinkSymbols to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid TDD configuration and uplink transmission failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofUplinkSymbols 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的 TDD 配置，並造成上行傳輸失敗。
